channel.title: Lagg
channel.description: I Get To Much Lagg, Is There A Lagg Handler That Will Work For SpecialPkz Source (The Lost Universe) Please Help.

item.title: Lagg
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Adding to ZoltanMan, clean up your process() in your client class.

Read full topic

item.title: Lagg
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

[quote=“TOMSCAPE BETA, post:6, topic:272875”][quote author=Owner A Raffo link=topic=360187.msg2744771#msg2744771 date=1239562051]
Will Any Lag Handler Work? Because Before I Made My Server I Played Special Pkz And There Is No Lagg In That.
[/quote]
Do you have mass npc’s in one area? Do you have mass objects? Is your ‘coding’ messy? Is your client java flowing well? I could go on for days if you like? You should look at your source files and tyde it up get rid of stuff you dont need.[/quote]

Getting rid of unused code will just clean up the file. It has nothing to do with the speed of the server.

Only advice I can give is just use good programming practices. And stop using integers for your processes.

Read full topic
